content: **knitted mittens for men in drops lima and drops kid-silk the piece is worked bottom up with stocking stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern li-167 yarn group b + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl circumference approx 18-20 cm length approx 26-28 cm **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 7810 khaki and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-25 g colour 19 dark green **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 27 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
